attributes.action: Shabana Mahmood MP to step down
attributes.additional_details: Shabana Mahmood MP has promoted public disorder by calling for a boycott against Kosher foods served in british supermarkets. All people are equal and Shabana Mahmood should not be allowed to represent a community of cultures and religions including those of the Jewish faith. Politics is not a place for taking sides in religion.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House, not government.
